div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode where concept is-a _IndividualInsuredPartyRoleType
Import all the codes that are contained in StudentRoleType

description.value: **Description**A role recognized through the eligibility of a party to play an individual insured for benefits covered or provided under an insurance policy where the party is also the policy holder.
